name: TLCOAUP
description:
A Point and Click game that told a story about a girl that is struggling to find a job, she must make the right choices in her day-to-day life to ensure that she will get a job.

Member:

  • Nafis Widi - Artist
  • Riki Wahyu - Artist (status: unknown)
  • Dio Tsani - Programmer
  • Abdul Azziz - Programmer
  • Taufiq Hida - Designer
